p: Further, regarding the expression profiles of DOF5.4 orthologous genes ( BnaA06g24490D, BnaA02g43890D, BnaA09g07030D), although BnaA06g24490D is absent for ZS11 in early stages (<day 10)), its gene expression value is strongly increasing until day 15 after flowering and decreasing after day 15 in both of the cultivars (see Figure 6). The expression profiles of other DOF family members are given in the Supplementary Information Figures S4â€“S8.
